nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区西长安街80号

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管组织、干部、人才、公务员、离退休干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: A functional department under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for organization, cadres, talent, civil servants, and retired cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部分管日常工作的副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee in charge of daily work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部副部长兼中央机构编制委员会办公室主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee and Director of the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

nodes.id: 中央机构编制委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央机构编制委员会办公室
en: Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission

description.zh-cn: 负责中国党和国家机构编制管理的常设办事机构，由中共中央组织部统一管理。
description.en: A permanent office responsible for the institutional organization and management of the Party and state in China, managed by the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently a Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部副部长兼国家公务员局局长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently a Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee and Director of the National Civil Service Administration.

description.zh-cn: 负责中国公务员管理的机构。2018年并入中共中央组织部，对外保留牌子。
description.en: The agency responsible for the administration of civil servants in China. It was merged into the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee in 2018, retaining its external nameplate.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部副部长兼干部二局局长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently a Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee and Director of the Second Bureau for Cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央组织部内设机构。
description.en: An internal bureau of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部部务委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently a member of the departmental affairs committee of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部部务委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently a member of the departmental affairs committee of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部部务委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently a member of the departmental affairs committee of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央纪委国家监委驻中央组织部纪检监察组组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group stationed at the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部秘书长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Secretary-General of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central governing body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会直属机构

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属机构

description.zh-cn: 直接隶属于中国共产党中央委员会的机构类型。
description.en: A category of institutions directly subordinate to the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary, political theorist, and founding father of the People's Republic of China, whom he ruled as the chairman of the Communist Party of China from its establishment in 1949 until his death in 1976.

nodes.id: 中共中央关于中央机构调整及精简的决定

zh-cn: 中共中央关于中央机构调整及精简的决定

description.zh-cn: 1943年由中共中央政治局会议通过的关于机构调整的决定，设立了宣传委员会和组织委员会。
description.en: A decision on institutional adjustment and simplification passed by the CPC Politburo meeting in 1943, which established the Propaganda Committee and the Organization Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义理论家、革命家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, statesman, and theorist. He was Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee from 1954 to 1959, First Vice Chairman of the Communist Party of China from 1956 to 1966 and Chairman of the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1968.

description.zh-cn: 1943年设立的中共中央政治局和书记处的助理机关，负责管理中央组织部等部门。
description.en: An assistant body to the CPC Politburo and Secretariat established in 1943, responsible for managing departments including the Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的中共中央直属事业单位，由中央组织部管理。
description.en: A CPC Central Committee-affiliated public institution located in Shanghai, managed by the Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 位于井冈山的中共中央直属事业单位，由中央组织部管理。
description.en: A CPC Central Committee-affiliated public institution located in Jinggangshan, managed by the Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 位于延安的中共中央直属事业单位，由中央组织部管理。
description.en: A CPC Central Committee-affiliated public institution located in Yan'an, managed by the Central Organization Department.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革
en: Deepening reform of Party and state institutions

description.zh-cn: 2018年启动的中国党和国家机构的大规模改革，旨在加强党的集中统一领导。
description.en: A large-scale reform of China's party and state institutions initiated in 2018, aimed at strengthening the centralized and unified leadership of the Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主要创始人及早期领导人。
description.en: A main founder and early leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, politician, military strategist, and diplomat who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国第一代主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the first-generation senior leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前高级领导人。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西北地区设立的中央局。
description.en: A Central Bureau established by the Communist Party of China in the Northwest region.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记。
description.en: An early senior leader of the Communist Party of China who served as its General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前高级官员。
description.en: A former senior official of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一。
description.en: An early senior leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会轮训和培训中国共产党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的学校。
description.en: The school that trains senior and mid-level leading cadres and Marxist theorists of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前领导人之一。
description.en: A former leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of China's reform and opening up.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前高级官员。
description.en: A former senior official of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中华人民共和国发生的一场大规模政治运动。
description.en: A large-scale political movement that took place in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党官员，曾任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: An official of the Communist Party of China, who served as the Minister of the Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间设立的机构。
description.en: An organization established during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会派驻中央组织部纪检监察组

zh-cn: 中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会派驻中央组织部纪检监察组
中央纪委国家监委驻中央组织部纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 由中央纪委国家监委设在中共中央组织部的派驻机构。
description.en: A stationed agency established by the CCDI-NSC in the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.en: The Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee is a functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

中国共产党中央委员会组织部

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 1924年5月，中共中央正式决定分设宣传、组织、工农等部，成立了中央组织部。
description.en: In May 1924, the CPC Central Committee formally decided to establish several departments including propaganda, organization, and workers-peasants, thus founding the Central Organization Department.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

relationships.source: 中共中央关于中央机构调整及精简的决定
relationships.target: 组织委员会

description.zh-cn: 该决定设立了组织委员会，作为政治局和书记处的助理机关。
description.en: This decision established the Organization Committee as an assistant body to the Politburo and the Secretariat.

relationships.target: 组织委员会

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
relationships.target: 组织委员会

description.zh-cn: 组织委员会负责统一管理中央组织部等部门。
description.en: The Organization Committee was responsible for the unified management of departments including the Central Organization Department.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 中国浦东干部学院为中央直属事业单位，由中央组织部管理。
description.en: China Executive Leadership Academy Pudong is a public institution directly under the Central Committee and managed by the Central Organization Department.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 中国井冈山干部学院为中央直属事业单位，由中央组织部管理。
description.en: China Executive Leadership Academy Jinggangshan is a public institution directly under the Central Committee and managed by the Central Organization Department.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 中国延安干部学院为中央直属事业单位，由中央组织部管理。
description.en: China Executive Leadership Academy Yan'an is a public institution directly under the Central Committee and managed by the Central Organization Department.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革
relationships.target: 国家公务员局

description.zh-cn: 根据《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，不再保留单设的国家公务员局。
description.en: According to the 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions', the separately established National Civil Service Administration was abolished.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 根据《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，国家公务员局并入中央组织部。
description.en: According to the 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions', the National Civil Service Administration was merged into the Central Organization Department.

relationships.source: 中央机构编制委员会办公室
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 中共中央组织部统一管理中央机构编制委员会办公室。
description.en: The Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee exercises unified management over the Office of the Central Institutional Organization Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后不久，中共中央组织部业务工作停顿。
description.en: Shortly after the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, the operational work of the Central Organization Department of the CPC came to a halt.
